Sentece: The decreased urinary excretion most likely contributed to the prolonged half-life (from 36 hours to 95 hours) and increased area under the plasma concentration-time curve (+56%) in the patients with renal insufficiency as compared with the healthy volunteers.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of orally administered levocabastine in patients with renal insufficiency.

Sentece: Drug absorption is incomplete after intranasal and ocular administration, with systemic availability ranging from 60 to 80% for levocabastine nasal spray and from 30 to 60% for the eye drops.
